original_title: Shoot the Moon Right Between the Eyes
overview: Jerry and Carl have conned their way from one small Texas town to another, but things go haywire when one of them falls in love with Maureen. Not to mention the P.I. that's hot on their trail... A musical comedy based on "Two Gallants" by James Joyce and the songs of John Prine.
title: Shoot the Moon Right Between the Eyes
